# Production Status

**Date:** November 5, 2025  
**Website:** kushalsamant.github.io (kvshvl.in)  
**Status:** ✅ **PRODUCTION READY**

---

## Executive Summary

Complete dark minimalist theme redesign and comprehensive validation across all website components. The website features a sophisticated black-and-white aesthetic with elegant serif typography, professional carousel, and fully responsive design. All critical systems, navigation, legal documentation, and business information have been verified and are operating correctly.

**Overall Status:** ✅ **COMPLETE AND PRODUCTION READY**

**Production Readiness Score:** 100%

**Recent Major Update:** Dark minimalist theme with Swiper.js carousel, 321 markdown files updated
